name: Amarok Live Ubuntu Distribution
short_description: Amarok - Ubuntu is a live Ubuntu Linux distribution with my own favorite collection of utilities installed, along with my own theme. The types of programs and packages installed are focused towards Network/Security utilities, Multimedia, and Games.
